kpi.name: M8001C217

kpi_info.title: Average number of available PRBs per TTI on PUSCH
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the average number of PRBs on PUSCH available for dynamic scheduling. UPDATED: The counter is updated each time the number of PRBs available for dynamic scheduling for non-GBR and GBR bearers is changed.

kpi.kpi_alias: Average number of available PRBs per TTI on PUSCH
